data.text: @OAG_BC @BC_Housing More corruption.  Donâ€™t trust this report.

@OAG_BC @BC_Housing The hoteliers that participated in BC's housing program that didn't sell their hotel but housed the homeless were also saved from bankruptcy. These people running these hotels need to stay in the game and keeping them in the game was BC housing.

@OAG_BC @BC_Housing Considering I am the author of the policy of picking up the homeless and putting them in hotel rooms I would like to state that there was a benefit to those that sold their hotels to BC housing of escaping bankruptcy as a result of no customers due to covid restrictions.
@OAG_BC @BC_Housing Any looking into the management contracts of these properties?
